verses.roman:
'sarvabhauma bhaṭṭācārya kahila tomāra guṇe
tomāre milite more karila yatane

synonyms: sārvabhauma bhaṭṭācārya—of the name Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kahila—has spoken; tomāra—your; guṇe—good qualities; tomāre—you; milite—to meet; more—Me; karila—made; yatane—endeavor.
translation: "Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya spoke of your good qualities, and he made a great endeavor to convince Me to meet you.
